class.name: NDIVersionCheck
class.brief_description: Warns about new releases of Godot NDI
class.description: Checks GitHub and prints a warning in the console incase there is a new version of Godot NDI available. Automatically added in the editor by [EditorPluginNDI].

method.name: get_copyright_info
method.description: Copyright and license information for Godot NDI and the NDI SDK headers. Can be appended to [url=https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/classes/class_engine.html#class-engine-method-get-copyright-info]Engine.get_copyright_info()[/url].
